member.name: T:Deveel.Webhooks.DefaultWebhookFactory
member.summary: A default implementation of the that creates a instance using the information provided by the subscription and the event.

member.name: T:Deveel.Webhooks.DefaultWebhookFactory`1
member.summary: A default implementation of the that creates a instance using the information from the subscription and the event.

remarks.para: The sender and notifier services are not bound to a specific type of webhook, and this factory is used to create the default type of webhook provided for convenience.
It is possible to create a custom webhook type by implementing this factory and overriding the

By default the class is configured with attributes from the System.Text.Json library and the System.Xml namespace, so that the serialization process recognizes them and uses them to serialize the data: if you need to use other serializers you might experience inconsistent results.

member.name: M:Deveel.Webhooks.DefaultWebhookFactory`1.CreateData(Deveel.Webhooks.IWebhookSubscription,Deveel.Webhooks.EventInfo)
member.summary: When overridden, creates the data object that is carried by the webhook to the receiver.
member.param: The subscription that is listening to the event
The event that is being delivered to the subscription
member.returns: Returns a data object that is carried by the webhook through the property.

member.name: M:Deveel.Webhooks.DefaultWebhookFactory`1.CreateAsync(Deveel.Webhooks.IWebhookSubscription,Deveel.Webhooks.EventInfo,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Creates a new webhook instance using the information from the subscription and the event.
member.param: The subscription that is listening to the event
The event that is being delivered to the subscription
A cancellation token used to cancel the operation
member.returns: Returns a task that resolves to the created webhook

member.name: T:Deveel.Webhooks.ITenantWebhookNotifier`1
member.summary: A service that resolves subscriptions to events, prepares and delivers webhooks to the subscribers owned by a specific tenant.
member.typeparam: The type of the webhook that is delivered
member.remarks: Implementations of this interface resolve subscriptions to events that are owned by a specific tenant, explicitly set. To make this to happen the service might invoke a discovery service that will first resolve the storage context of the tenant.

member.name: M:Deveel.Webhooks.ITenantWebhookNotifier`1.NotifyAsync(System.String,Deveel.Webhooks.EventInfo,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Notifies to the subscribers the occurrence of the given event.
member.param: The scope of the tenant holding the subscriptions to the given event.
The ifnormation of the event that occurred.
member.returns: Returns an object that describes the aggregated final result of the notification process executed.

member.name: T:Deveel.Webhooks.ITenantWebhookSubscriptionResolver
member.summary: Provides a contract for the resolution of subscriptions to events owned by a specific tenant.
member.remarks: This service is primarily used by the implementation, to delegate the resolution of subscriptions to a specific type of event types.

member.name: M:Deveel.Webhooks.ITenantWebhookSubscriptionResolver.ResolveSubscriptionsAsync(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Resolves all the subscriptions to an event in the scope of a given tenant.
member.param: The identifier of the tenant owning the subscriptions.
The type of event that has occurred.
A flag indicating whether only active subscriptions should be returned.
member.returns: Returns a list of instances that are matching the given basic conditions.

member.summary: Defines the contract for a resolver of a that is specific to a given webhook type.
member.typeparam: The type of the webhook that is scoped for the resolver.
member.remarks: Implementations of this version of the interface are segregated to the scope of the webhook type.

member.name: T:Deveel.Webhooks.IWebhookNotifier`1
member.summary: A service that resolves subscriptions to events, prepares and delivers webhooks to the subscribers.
member.typeparam: The type of the webhook that is delivered
member.remarks: Implementations of this interface resolve subscriptions to events without any tenant scope explicitly set: despite of this condition, the service might still resolve subscriptions to events that are owned by tenants, if the discovery is performed by a service that this resolver invokes.

member.name: T:Deveel.Webhooks.Webhook
member.summary: A default implementation of that can be used to transport the data of a notification, provided for convenience.

remarks.para: The sender and notifier services are not constrained to a specific type of webhook, and this class is used to create the default webhook, implementing the constract.

By default this class is configured with attributes from the System.Text.Json library and the System.Xml namespace, so that the serialization process recognizes them and uses them to serialize the data: if you need to use other serializers you might experience inconsistent results.

member.name: M:Deveel.Webhooks.WebhookNotifierBase`1.MatchesAsync(Deveel.Webhooks.WebhookSubscriptionFilter,`0,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Matches the given webhook against the given filter.
member.param: The subscription filter to match the webhook against.
The webhook to match against the filter.
A cancellation token that can be used to cancel the operation.
member.remarks:
The default implementation of this method invokes a filter evaluator if the following pre-conditions are met:
The filer is not empty or null (it returns true)
The filter is not a wildcard (it returns true)
member.returns: Returns true if the webhook matches the filter, false otherwise.
member.exception: Thrown when the filter format is not supported.
